This is kind of wholesome and depressing at the same time. Megu from the future was able to keep Kanata alive for the current Megu yet she herself was not able to experience the love from the Kanata she had. I wonder if she would be happy the way things still are for her: simply 'disappearing' is does not sit well as she is still unsatisfied herself despite what she's doing for Kanata. I hope she can be happy, too.

I bet they both died in an accident and the future girl is someone else. Someone probably already talked about this, but come it’s so obvious that it’s a different person. If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

... Its a multiverse ( Many Worlds Interpretation one to be precise ). In one version of the history Kanta dies and in the newly created one he doesn't. At the same time the future Meguru gets to live as nothing really changes in her "home" universe / timeline. Paradox free time travel is such a nice bonus of that hypothesis !

I'm not sure where the guy below me got that information, but don't listen to him. He's disillusioned and retarded. He's probably talking about how at the end she says "are you happy meguru" with teary eyes. He's too stupid to know that she is saying that, because before she came back from the future, she wasn't able to do what they were doing. She missed her chance before he died. Please don't mind this retard called SMNLS.

So basically, she tried acting like he'll be able to live if he had sex with her, but essentially he was actually gonna die no matter if she had come back to the past or not, and she just wanted to have sex with him one last time?
